answers.answer: that BG is too high the sugar is coming out in your pee making the foam.BG that high can make you verry tiredBG over 140 IS causing damage to your eyes, nerves and kidneys. lowering your carbohydrate at meals will help lower BG.
Go see your doctor, not a nurse. Foamy urine could be a sign of kidney failure. Fatigue could be associated with diabetes or liver failure or an infection.

I hope you received appropriate testing, evaluation and treatment for your stated condition.  As a diabetic you must be alert to any changes in your body functions as each can be a sign of associated complications.  My mother recently had a urinary tract infection which I assumed would be cleared up in short order.  In less than a month she was rushed to the ER and later that day died of pulmonary embolism.Again, take nothing for granted, get checked out, ask lots of questions, research your symptoms, ask more questions and get to the right answer for your health, your life.Best WishesBilly

question: Hello everyone. I am in my 40's and recently diabetic for the past 5 years. I am taking diabetic, high blood pressure and cholesterol medications. Lately for the past 4 weeks I have been feeling tiredness, fatique and low energy in the mornings or at noon time on and off but everyday its gradually getting worse and worse.Lately I have been feeling fatique and like passing out at work, especially after 10 am every morning or so. My blood pressure is on the high side and my sugar slightly over 200. I notice in the mornings I am peeing foam in the toilet and never seen that before. Not sure if thats a indication of some health problem. I need professional advice on this matter because I am confused at to what this is. Your answers will be greatly appreciated since I am not feeling well today. Thanks in advance.edit: Last week I visit the diabetic nurse for this matter and she told me to eat a mid morning snack for possible low sugar, low energy. The diabetic nurse did say this could possibly be something else and that I may have to see another doctor for this worsing illness. Thanks.
title: Need help I am feeling very sick and confused as what it can be. :o(?
